title: Red lentil and bulgur soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, diced', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '2 plum tomatoes, diced', "2 teaspoons za'atar (see note)", '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon garlic granules', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper (optional)', '250ml carrot juice', '1L water', '1 chicken stock cube', '1 vegetable stock cube', '200g red lentils', '35g bulgur wheat', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon freshly chopped coriander (optional)', '6 tablespoons soured cream (optional)']
